time that the cloud of allegations surrounding Andy Coulson 's tenure at the News of the World raised real questions about his ability to be at the heart of the Downing Street machine.'' Mr Ed Miliband added: It raises real questions about David Cameron 's judgment that he hung on to Andy Coulson for so long.`` I think David Cameron made the wrong judgment because it is clear that there are questions to be answered about his time as editor of the News of the World.`` It's right that he's gone, but it should have happened earlier. Boxing promoter Frank Warren was spotted consoling Mr Andy Coulson as he prepared to announce his departure as they dined at a Westminster restaurant on Thursday. At an upscale hotel in Dallas Texas a top official in the city of Dallas gave the key to the city to Michael Vick . In a gushing like a school girl with a crush display he hands over the key to Michael Vick . On Monday morning the Mayor of Dallas demanded it back.
